title: Deadlines  |  Admission & Aid  |  DePaul University | DePaul University, Chicago
content: Admission & Aid Types of Admission Visit DePaul Tuition Room & Board Scholarships Financial Aid Veteran Student Test Credit & Placement Check Your Application Status Admitted Students Deadlines Immunization Apply Online Request Info Visit Campus DePaul University>Admission & Aid>Deadlines Deadlines Find your student type for application deadlines The word “deadline” will become part of your daily vocabulary in college, beginning with the application process. Be sure to meet our application and admission deadlines (or better yet, be early). If you’re unsure which student type you are, visit ourTypes of Admissionpage. Freshman Student Graduate Student Each graduate program has its own admission requirements and deadlines.Select your program for more information. Transfer and Adult Undergraduate Students Transfer and Adult undergraduate admission takes place on a rolling basis. Your application and transcripts can be reviewed at any time prior to your start date. The earliest time that application and transcript review can take place is one year prior to your desired starting term. Other Types of Admission Deadlines
